text: David Olaniyi Oyedepo (born on 27 September 1954 in Oshogbo, Osun State) is a Nigerian preacher, Christian author, businessman, architect, the Founder of the Living Faith Church Worldwide, and the presiding Bishop of the Faith Tabernacle in Ota, Ogun State. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerian writers Category:Nigerian Christian clergy Category:People from Osun State
title: David Oyedepo
